Enjoy Playing RummyJacks? Share your referral code & ask your friends to install and enter your referral code when asked. Bonus upto ₹5000 gets credited in phases as your friend plays Cash Rummy.

1. You earn upto ₹5000 for Every Friend you refer.

2. Whenever your friend adds Cash on RummyJacks, a percentage of such amount gets added to your 'Issued Bonus' Account. Maximum Bonus amount is restricted to ₹4500

3. If your friend successfully gets his KYC verified, you'll get an additional bonus of ₹500.

4. You may refer a maximum of 20 Friends & earn upto ₹1,00,000
